FROM ubuntu:16.04

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    clang-format \
    make \
    python-pip \
    && apt-get -yqq clean \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir setuptools
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir autopep8
